*We plan to release the code in February of 2009 when the last few major features are complete.*

*Thanks for your interest in our project and feel free to [http://openipam.org/htm/contact contact us] with questions.*

== This code is very pre-alpha. If it runs at all it will likely eat your homework, chase your dog, and die a horrible death soon after. No support provided! ==


Use this command to anonymously check out the latest project source code:
{{{
# Non-members may check out a read-only working copy anonymously over HTTP.
svn checkout http://openipam.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ openipam-read-only
}}}
